libraryStrings.conversionError: Could not convert to glb format.
libraryStrings.dropFolderHere: Drop folder with all glTF assets here
libraryStrings.fileDamaged: Could not check the file. It might be damaged.
libraryStrings.filetypeNotSupported: This file doesn't seem to be a supported 3D model type.
libraryStrings.noGLTFFound: There's no glTF file in this folder
libraryStrings.browserCannotConvert: You tried to upload a glTF file without embedded assets. Immediate conversion to .glb files is not supported on this browser. Please look for an alternative converter.
libraryStrings.onlyEmbeddedAssets: You tried to upload a glTF file without embedded assets. It should be inside a folder with other files. Drop that folder onto the dropzone to create a single file that can be used.
libraryStrings.onlyVersionTwo: This glTF file is of version 1.0. Please convert it to version 2.0 in order to use it here.
